title: Bloomberg Markets: Barton on Buying Into Tech Pullback

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: D.R. Barton, Jr. Chief Technical Strategist MoneyMorning.com Discussing the markets and investing in tech, including Facebook and Zillow.
